name: Devilish Blind Date
description:
Main character is a working professional with a history of multiple failed blind dates.
One day, after the usual disappointing end to yet another blind date, he decided to release his soul with video games.
He never expected to be transported to isekai such suddenly,. Just as he was about to be attacked by strange creatures,
A strangely dressed young girl appeared before him..


  • This game is heavily inspired by『Vampire Survivors』
  • Various skills can be upgraded, helping you defeat 20+ kinds of monsters!
  • You can also challenge leaderboard after clearing all stages.
